com.stripe.android

Class CardUtils

  • com.stripe.android.CardUtils

  • public class CardUtils

    Utility class for functions to do with cards.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CardUtils INSTANCE
      Utility class for functions to do with cards.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getPossibleCardType(java.lang.String cardNumber)
      Returns a interface Card.CardBrand corresponding to a partial card number, or Card.CardBrand.UNKNOWN if the card brand can't be determined from the input value.
      static boolean isValidCardNumber(java.lang.String cardNumber)
      Checks the input string to see whether or not it is a valid card number, possibly with groupings separated by spaces or hyphens.

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static CardUtils INSTANCE

        Utility class for functions to do with cards.

    • Method Detail

      • getPossibleCardType

        public static java.lang.String getPossibleCardType(java.lang.String cardNumber)

        Returns a interface Card.CardBrand corresponding to a partial card number, or Card.CardBrand.UNKNOWN if the card brand can't be determined from the input value.

        Parameters:
        cardNumber - a credit card number or partial card number
        Returns:
        the interface Card.CardBrand corresponding to that number, or CardBrand.UNKNOWN if it can't be determined
        See Also:
        interface Card.CardBrand

      • isValidCardNumber

        public static boolean isValidCardNumber(java.lang.String cardNumber)

        Checks the input string to see whether or not it is a valid card number, possibly with groupings separated by spaces or hyphens.

        Parameters:
        cardNumber - a String that may or may not represent a valid card number
        Returns:
        true if and only if the input value is a valid card number
